    1: from pandas import (
    2:     Index,
    3:     NaT,
    4:     Period,
    5:     PeriodIndex,
    6: )
    7: import pandas._testing as tm
    8: 
    9: 
   10: class TestFillNA:
   11:     def test_fillna_period(self):
   12:         # GH#11343
   13:         idx = PeriodIndex(["2011-01-01 09:00", NaT, "2011-01-01 11:00"], freq="h")
   14: 
   15:         exp = PeriodIndex(
   16:             ["2011-01-01 09:00", "2011-01-01 10:00", "2011-01-01 11:00"], freq="h"
   17:         )
   18:         result = idx.fillna(Period("2011-01-01 10:00", freq="h"))
   19:         tm.assert_index_equal(result, exp)
   20: 
   21:         exp = Index(
   22:             [
   23:                 Period("2011-01-01 09:00", freq="h"),
   24:                 "x",
   25:                 Period("2011-01-01 11:00", freq="h"),
   26:             ],
   27:             dtype=object,
   28:         )
   29:         result = idx.fillna("x")
   30:         tm.assert_index_equal(result, exp)
   31: 
   32:         exp = Index(
   33:             [
   34:                 Period("2011-01-01 09:00", freq="h"),
   35:                 Period("2011-01-01", freq="D"),
   36:                 Period("2011-01-01 11:00", freq="h"),
   37:             ],
   38:             dtype=object,
   39:         )
   40:         result = idx.fillna(Period("2011-01-01", freq="D"))
   41:         tm.assert_index_equal(result, exp)
